Interface ExerciseRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Exercise,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Exercise,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Exercise>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Exercise,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Exercise,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Exercise,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Exercise>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Exercise,Long>
@Repository public interface ExerciseRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Exercise,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Exercise>
Description:

Interface which provides the methods to perform CRUD operation on the database table entity Exercise

    • getDataCount

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(e) FROM Exercise e") Long getDataCount()
      Fetches the total count of the exercises currently stored in the database
      Returns:
      total count of exercise stored in the table

    • findAll

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Exercise> findAll(org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<Exercise> specification, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This methods fetches exercises in a pagination format, meaning it fetches pages based on their size and page number. It also filters the pages based on the specification passed in the parameter
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Exercise>
      Parameters:
      specification - an object of interface org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification
      pageable - an object of interface org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable
      Returns:
      an object of org.springframework.data.domain.Page
